attributes.action: Be accountable for DWP decision processes
attributes.additional_details: To meet targets set by civil servants meet meet the needs of government. To show how good they are in meeting their manifesto
attributes.background: People are being forced to commit suicide because of the claim system. Which is regulated by the Government whom we elected.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

We understand you are concerned about DWP decision making but we are not sure what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do about it.

The Work and Pensions Committee examines the policy and administration of the DWP. You can find about their work here:

https://www.parliament.uk/business/committees/committees-a-z/commons-select/work-and-pensions-committee/

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like taken.
